description: This file defines the AuthProvider class, which manages authentication state and actions in a Flutter application, including login, registration, auto-login, and logout functionalities using repositories, services, and app state.

classes.name: AuthProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages authentication state, providing methods for login, registration, auto-login, and logout, and maintaining user info and tokens.

methods.name: tryAutoLogin
methods.description: Attempts to automatically log in the user by reading a saved token and fetching user profile.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Performs user login with email and password, updates tokens and user profile.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with email, password, and optional full name, and updates authentication state.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the user by clearing tokens and user info, and disconnects notifications.
